attributes.title: This app made my hamster go into hibernation! 😒✖️
attributes.review:
So I opened the app with my hamster and the picture of trump’s traumatizing nude pops up
And now my hamster doesn’t wake up and my eyes are currently bleeding from this picture. 😵 I went to the hospital and I showed them what caused this and now they passed out and my hamster is still in hibernation to this day. 😠☠︎︎

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This app was horrible and I just hated everything about it starting  from the layout to the what the app was selling. It was just completely awful and if anyone else downloads this app the only reason should be for them to write a review on how terrible this thing was because it was HORRIBLE!

attributes.title: Just plain awful
attributes.review: This app is ridiculous so many ads about the president and it glitches so much it shows the presidents nudes and I’m not okay with my son seeing that he is 5 years old for god sake I want this app away their is no use to it and think that many will agree with my complaint

attributes.title: 0 stars for me
attributes.review: If I could give a 0 star rating I would have. This app is trash. It takes so long to load and when it dose it glitches your phone like crazy, crashing. It also makes you give there phone number before you can see what is in the app.

attributes.title: Most disgusting app ever
attributes.review: This app is awful.  It played nonstop music and summoned ghosts to my house. My entire family was murdered all because of this app. then it contacted someone to burn my house down. never ever download this app unless you want everything ruined. not to mention the fact that it supports the joke in office.

attributes.title: It was horrible 0/10
attributes.review: When i downloaded it i realized that it had filled my phone up with absolute trash. It made me very upset and if i could rate it 0 stars i would. Not only did it fill my phone up with trash, it made my phone glitch so much and gave me a virus. It was a horrible experience.

attributes.title: The worst app to ever exist!
attributes.review: There are bees coming from my screen when I open the app up and I don’t know how control them! Even worse, an orange hit me on the head from the front camera. I got a concussion! I would NOT recommend this app. Just awful. Even worse then life360, and THAT is saying something!!!

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: this app took 3 months to download, i was already 15 years old by the time it downloaded, donald trump is the reason that my cat ran away, not because i sprayed water on him, (ofc) but anyways this is why i’m not voting for donald trump. i now have ants everywhere because of this app, and i agree with everyone else’s reviews

attributes.title: get rid of this app immediately
attributes.review: as soon as I opened the app they asked me to sell my soul so mr Trump could get a new tan, when I refused 4 black cars swarmed my house and kidnapped me. They proceeded to put me in a satanic circle which goes against my Christianity while the star spangled banner played in the back. My president proceeded to call me a n*gger even though I love him

attributes.title: Horrible
